title: Drawing, "Design for the Frame of the Portrait of Charles III, King of Spain", ca. 1760
medium: Graphite, pen and brush and black ink, wash on paper
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Design for a cartouche. Various rocaille allegorical figures surround.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for the Frame of the Portrait of Charles III, King of Spain", ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Graphite, pen and brush and black ink, wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-383-2.
